SEARCH
Package com.gaminghub.app.data.entity

Class OrderItemEntity

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.data.entity.OrderItemEntity
@Table("order_items") public class OrderItemEntity extends Object
Represents an order item entity mapped to the order_items table in the database.

Each instance corresponds to a single item within an order, including details such as the quantity ordered, the unit price at the time of purchase, and the associated game.

Note: The units_price field may be deprecated in the future because the price can be calculated dynamically from the game's price multiplied by the quantity.

Provides conversion to the presentation layer model OrderItemModel.

See Also:

    • OrderItemEntity

      public OrderItemEntity(int order_item_id, int order_id, int quantity, float units_price, int game_id)
      Constructs an OrderItemEntity with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      order_item_id - the unique ID of the order item
      order_id - the ID of the order this item belongs to
      quantity - the quantity ordered for this item
      units_price - the unit price at the time of ordering
      game_id - the ID of the game associated with this item
